Reviews.Title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
Reviews.Author: T. Hans "Nature Lover"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this system  and also a couple of the longer range cameras for my business and had it installed by an electronics person. It worked okay for a couple of months and then started having numerous problems. I called and sent e-mails to the SVAT company for months but did not get a response until today and that was to inform me that they would not do anything because the system is no longer under warranty and suggested I spend another $700.00 to replace some of the faulty equipment I purchased. Of course I got no response from this company while the equipment was under warranty. VERY BAD EQUIPMENT and VERY UNETHICAL BUSINESS PRACTICES!I wish I could give them a minus 9 rating!!!!

Reviews.Title: Clearvu3 security system

Reviews.Content: I bought this item 4 months ago and love it.Picture quality is outstanding better then expected.Customer service is really good as well.Would highly recommend this itemConstanze Russell

Reviews.Title: Great!!!
Reviews.Author: Newton G. Grayson "NGG"
Reviews.Content: At first i thought i would never get this product up and running, then i call SVAT and the tech support was fantastic; in les then ten minutes they had it up for me... i love this system and i have no regret buying it.for all of you out that are looking for a great security system, PLEASE contact SVAT PLEASE and check out their new CLEARVU3 WEB READY; it is aaaaawsome.
